TopicTitle: Post your favorite KSP fail moments.

Articles.Content:
Post your best pictures/videos/stories of completely catastrophic kerbal calamities.

My submission: I forgot to account for Gilly's rotation while setting up a low pass during an EVA landing, and a mountain rotated into the path of my 450 tonne space yacht.

http://www.twitch.tv/mrspoonman09/c/2614019

Not by me. But this describes some situations fairly well. ^^

-snip-

Edited July 22, 2013 by Aphox
You should know better.

i think this is the 100000000th thread with this same title.

anyways...

ejected my unmanned ship to Jool and forgot the turn on the solar pannels... the ship has all the HOME mod things in it... and was huge...

Best explosion ever.

This crash, which began a chain of events that led to a very fun rescue mission. Link in my sig.

These, because of the look on the guys' faces.

And this most recent one, which killed one of my kerbals, (who later came back life,) which deadweasel turned into this clip

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dYSQxsRpIO0
